overview: Featuring stories of young girls enamored by older men. Elektra Rose is a naughty nymphette who needs a little persuasion from her agent to show up for work. Keisha Grey gets a private lesson with her favorite writer. Shauna Skye may not be familiar with her boyfriend's actor father, but she knows a great kiss when she gets one. Josie Jagger has some issues that only her therapist can get to the bottom of.
tagline: Looking For Love In All The Wrong Places
title: Father Figure 8
